#summary Configuring FTP Accounts
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

FTP Accounts tab provides a powerful interface to configure your FTP Account settings: 

[http://i31.tinypic.com/2gvvn2u.png]

= FTP Account Syntax =

File Name: screenshot.jpg

== Standard Usage == 
{{{
Host: ftp.zscreen.net
SubFolderPath: ZScreen
HttpHomePath: google.com
URL: http://google.com/ZScreen/screenshot.jpg
}}}

== Empty HttpHomePath ==
=== Using main domain ===
{{{
Host: ftp.zscreen.net
SubFolderPath: ZScreen
HttpHomePath:
URL: http://zscreen.net/ZScreen/screenshot.jpg
}}}

=== Using Subdomain ===

{{{
Host: jaex.zscreen.net
SubFolderPath: ZScreen
HttpHomePath:
URL: http://jaex.zscreen.net/ZScreen/screenshot.jpg
}}}

== Using % to use Host ==
Note that this can only work, for instance, if you FTP Host supports accessing the server without prepending "ftp." to "zscreen.net". 
{{{
Host: zscreen.net
SubFolderPath: ZScreen
HttpHomePath: %/jaex
URL: http://zscreen.net/jaex/ZScreen/screenshot.jpg
}}}
